title: Kamala Harris Interview to Bill Bellamy Interview
itunes:title: Kamala Harris Interview to Bill Bellamy Interview
description:
Today on the show we had Senator Kamala Harris who is now in the running for Presidency 2020 stop by, where she spoke about gender pay gap, climate control, Russia and even took aim at Joe Biden. Also we had comedian and actor Bill Bellamy stop by where he spoke about creating the term "Booty Call", having kids, and stand up. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day"  to guy that has a little tantrum. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
